name: Kids In The Kitchen Project
blurb: Getting kids in the kitchen for whole food fun!

name: Our Country Cupboard Cookbook
blurb: 100 gluten-free recipes, everyone will love. Including 25 top secret seasoning mix recipes that make mealtime easy and delicious.

name: The uKeg Pressurized Growler for Fresh Beer
blurb: The uKeg™ growler keeps beer fresh and cold on the go. Vacuum insulated stainless steel with carbonation cap, pressure gauge and tap.

blurb:
Local | Organic | Fair Trade | Handcrafted

Tea Blends That Are Amazing For The Body And The Soul.

name: Story of My Tea - A Beautiful New Way To Discover Tea
blurb: A monthly tea subscription with 60 amazing teas a year, stories of the teas on your smartphone, and an app to record your exploration.

name: Little Tea Lady Subscription Box
blurb: Come on a tea journey, different teas to try each month! Different blends to try, or just order your favorites instead.

name: Geek Grind Coffee K-Cup Coffee Pods - 100% Women Owned Farms
blurb: Help us invest in K-Cup Coffee Pod Equipment and add 16 types of K-Cups!

name: RUDSPICE
blurb: Rudspice is a concentrated bottle of blended chilies and spices that are balanced across the palate. One spice all meals.

name: Native Indigenous Australian Bush herbs and spices
blurb: We are crazy about Australian native bush food! The oldest food on earth, sustainably harvested for thousands of years and still going.

name: Chocotein Protein Truffles
blurb: Nutritiously Delicious Chocolate Protein Truffles. 8g Protein per serving. Made with dark chocolate, espresso and crunchy coffee beans.

blurb: The Blue Cat Cafe - Food Trucks! Coffee! Adoptable Kitties!

name: Lidrivio : Greek Ultra Premium Extra Virgin Olive Oil
blurb: With < 0.3% & < 0.2% of acidity, Lidrivio is some of the finest Greek Premium Extra Virgin Olive Oil in the world.

name: Whole food nutrition bars funding clean water solutions!
blurb: Created to deliciously fill common nutritional gaps in the Standard American Diet. Vegan, Gluten-Free, Paleo-Friendly, and GMO-Free.

name: Unicreamer: Vegan Plant-based Protein Coffee Creamer
blurb: An on-the-go vegan coffee creamer infused with five grams of plant-based protein + one gram of coconut oil per serving.

name: Dehydrated Asian and vegan meals in 100% compostable bags
blurb: Just add hot water to the heat-resistant pouch, wait 20 minutes & ready to enjoy! Compost when done.

name: Il Vegano : la dolce vita
blurb: Vegan desserts with the focus on classic Italian.

name: Horus Market ☀️ -Vegan Delivery Marketplace-
blurb: We connect people who buy plant-based products with people who sell them in their local area.

name: The 8x8 Cookbook--Square Meals for Weeknight Dinner
blurb: Getting a delicious "square meal" on your dinner table just got a whole lot easier!

name: Blind Tea Tasting - A Guessing Game For Your Sense Of Flavor
blurb: World's First Tea Tasting Game - Taste mystery tea, identify the flavors, guess the teas and origins, and improve your tasting skills.

name: Chowza Confections – Deliciously Sweet Snacks with a Mission
blurb: Delicious "Muddy Buddies" (a.k.a. "puppy chow" for people) in amazing new flavors!

name: True Sicilian BlackBee Honey - Season 2018
blurb: The BlackBee Honey is back! Help us create awareness for the unique Sicilian Black Bee and his amazing honey.

blurb: From handmade noodles, to gyoza, takoyaki, and incredible ramen broths - learn to make it all in this unique Vegan Ramen Cookbook
